title: Ensure shareable links are restricted
description: Restrict shareable links in Microsoft Fabric to prevent unauthorized access to shared content.
rationale: Restricting shareable links helps prevent unauthorized access to sensitive or proprietary information by limiting who can access shared content.
impact: Users may need to request access more frequently, but data leakage risk is reduced.

remediation.text:
1. Navigate to Microsoft Fabric https://app.powerbi.com/admin-portal
2. Select Tenant settings.
3. Scroll to Export and Sharing settings.
4. Restrict shareable links as per organizational policy.
